issue.title: Camera images are not updated when moving some objects

content.raw: if you're still dragging the model with the mouse, the camera images should not change, and it's the expected behavior. It's only when you release the mouse, the client requests gzserver to update the model pose. The camera images should then change.
content.html: if you're still dragging the model with the mouse, the camera images should not change, and it's the expected behavior. It's only when you release the mouse, the client requests gzserver to update the model pose. The camera images should then change.
